what's been going on lately? well let's see. my parents have been in jamaica all week and i miss them like crazy! they're supposed to be back sometime tonite and i can't wait to see what they brought me lol. tina left last saturday for florida and they're not leaving until tomorrow morning. i'm definitely going thru tina-withdrawls. i don't know what im' gonna do when she leaves for school. i'm used to her living 3 minutes down the road and now she's gonna be 3 hours away. it's gonna suck when i can't just call her from her driveway and tell her to let me in because i need someone to talk to. it's really upsetting. and i've just been in this crappy mood all week. wednesday was scotts birthday which was really depressing. i bought him a dozen pink roses and took them to his wreck sight. emily went with me because tina wasn't here. i cried all day about everything. i'm an emotional wreck. no pun intended. and i talked to drew last nite and i officially feel like i deserve the title "bitch of the month" and it's only five days into august! i'm just not ready for anything at all with anyone. i thought it'd be ok but i was wrong. i don't think people understand how hurt i was a couple of months ago and i'm just not ready to put myself in the position to go thru it again. but nonetheless, i feel like shit about it.

josh called me the other day and we decided to make ammends. just as friends tho. we've been best friends for 6 years and that's so much stronger than what drew us apart so we made a pact to call eachother at least once a day and so far it's been great. i really missed talking to him about everything. he sold his corvette and got an avalanche because it's just more practical and he likes it so much more. and last nite he was telling me he's thinking about getting a puppy and you'll never guess what kind..only my favorite-bassett hound! im' so excited! he said i could visit it every day and that when he leaves next summer for his 5 month season i can even keep the dog! seriously, you don't even realize how much i love bassett hounds, it's unhealthy lol. and i think i'm going to tennessee sometime in september. he said he'd fly me up the last couple of days of the season and put me up in a hotel so i can meet everyone and that way since he has to drive his truck back, he won't have to drive alone. plus i'm pretty sure i've talked to just about all of the guys on the phone by now and i can't wait to meet them and he said they wanna meet me too, and the few that i havent talked to think i'm made up so we have to prove them wrong lol.

so i guess i better finish this and start cleaning the house up since mom and wayne should be home in the next 8 hours. and nick sydnor is supposed to drop by after work to refill the fridge since they drank all of our beer the other nite lol. have a good day.

love
